title: MonkeyOCR
please_click_parse: ## Please click the parse button to parse or click chat for single-task recognition...
prompt_text_content: Please output the text content from the image.
prompt_formula: Please write out the expression of the formula in the image using LaTeX format.
prompt_table_html: This is the image of a table. Please output the table in html format.
prompt_table_latex: Please output the table in the image in LaTeX format.
error_no_file_uploaded: Please upload an image or PDF file before chatting.
error_pdf_chat_not_supported: Only image chat is supported, PDF file chat is not supported.
warning_parse_failed_switching_chat: Parsing failed, switching to chat mode for direct recognition...
